info.title: Cobalt Plugin
info.description: The Cobalt plugin provides web browsing functionality based on the Cobalt engine.

url.description: The URL that is loaded upon starting the browser

width.description: The width in pixels of the surface to be used by the application

height.description: The height in pixels of the surface to be used by the application

repeatstart.description: The number of milliseconds a key should be pressed to start reapeating (set max to adhere to Thunder)

repeatinterval.description: The number of milliseconds the repeated key is send after it started repeating (set max to adhere to Thunder)

clientidentifier.description: An identifier, used during the surface creation as additional information

manufacturername.description: The name of the hardware manufacturer on which this software is running

chipmodelnumber.description: The number/string defining the SOC in this device

firmwareversion.description: The firmwareversion defining the Board Support Package (BSP) in this device

modelname.description: Name of the model on which this software is running

modelyear.description: The year this device is manufactured

operatorname.description: The name of the operator that owns the infrastructure on which this device is running

friendlyname.description: A user friendly name given to this device

language.description: The language to be used to for user interaction.

connection.description: The type of connection that is used for internet connectivity

playbackrates.description: If enabled, Cobalt supports different rates, otherwise, it supports only 0 and 1 (default: true)
